mapper.select: select file_id, patient_id, cast_id, file_type, file_name, minio_bucket, minio_path, upload_time, update_time, is_deleted from patient_case_files where file_id = #{fileId}
mapper.insert: insert into patient_case_files(patient_id, cast_id, file_type, file_name, minio_bucket, minio_path, upload_time, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{patientId}, #{castId}, #{fileType}, #{fileName}, #{minioBucket}, #{minioPath}, #{uploadTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted})

insert into patient_case_files(patient_id, cast_id, file_type, file_name, minio_bucket, minio_path, upload_time, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.patientId}, #{entity.castId}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.minioBucket}, #{entity.minioPath}, #{entity.uploadTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into patient_case_files(patient_id, cast_id, file_type, file_name, minio_bucket, minio_path, upload_time, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.patientId}, #{entity.castId}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.minioBucket}, #{entity.minioPath}, #{entity.uploadTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update patient_id = values(patient_id), cast_id = values(cast_id), file_type = values(file_type), file_name = values(file_name), minio_bucket = values(minio_bucket), minio_path = values(minio_path), upload_time = values(upload_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted)
mapper.update:
update patient_case_files
patient_id = #{patientId},
cast_id = #{castId},
file_type = #{fileType},
file_name = #{fileName},
minio_bucket = #{minioBucket},
minio_path = #{minioPath},
upload_time = #{uploadTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
where file_id = #{fileId}
